resources.string: Error: No space for more titles.

This is the Home Layout after starting the app. The software checks the root folder of the app about music files, audio books and play lists of the user. The user can see his folders and could touch on it to get into it..

Here we can see the content of a directory called Audio Books. The user can see his audio books and can play a audio book with a touch the play button. Further he can touch on the info button on the right hand side of the play button. This button will show info about the audio book.

Here we can see the content of a directory called My Music. The user can see his songs and can play a song with a touch the play button. Further he can touch on the info button on the right hand side of the play button. This button will show info about the song.

This is the Play Screen of the app. The user can see the cover, the Title, the Artist and the Length of the chosen song. With a click on the pause button, the song will pause, forward will go fast forward, rewind fast back. Play will play after Pause.

This is the Play Screen of the app. The user can see the cover, the Title, the Author and the Length of the chosen audio book. With a click on the pause button, the book will pause, forward will go fast forward, rewind fast back. Play will play after Pause.
This is the Info Screen of the app. Here the user can see all details of his chosen title. Cover, Album, Author/Artist, Length and Title.
